name: 呂怜樺
objective:
策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

5　　10/11　　企業內部資源與競爭優勢　　
6　　10/18　　以功能層級策略建立競爭優勢　　
7　　10/25　　事業層級策略　　
8　　11/1　　演講　　
9　　11/8         服務科技策略Orientation 張瑋倫
10　　11/15　　Digital transformation / AccorHotel　　
11　　11/22　　Importance of ICT / Walt Disney　　
12　　11/29　　Competition of ICT / Cirque du Soleil

14　　12/13　　Final presentation

16　　12/27　　水平、垂直整合與委外

2.　　個案討論 40% 
3.　　作業、報告 30%
materials:
1. Charles W. L. Hill, Melissa A. Schilling, Gareth R. Jones (2020), Strategic Management: Theory 13e, 13th Edition, South-Western. （朱文儀、陳建男譯，策略管理，第13版，華泰文化事業公司)
  2.授課教授提供相關的講義、案例等資料

name: 張瑋倫
objective: This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on the importance and competition of ICT. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.

12/13 ICT decisions / WestJet Airlines
12/20 Final presentation
